title: Queen Elizabeth II: Record-Breaking Globetrotting Multilingual Monarch
content:
Source: Euronews - 6 hours ago 
Queen Elizabeth II becomes longest reigning British monarch  01:08 Queen Elizabeth II makes history today by becoming Britain’s longest reigning monarch. Elizabeth, who is 89, is also the nation’s oldest ever monarch, surpassing her great-great-grandmother Queen Victoria’s time on the throne: 63 years, 7 months, 2 days, 16 hours and 23 minutes. To celebrate,...
